attributes.action: allow the BBC to make its iPlayer on-demand television service available to Windows users only.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would be highly uneconomical for the BBC to create a service for every platform available. They have chosen the most popular platform which would satisfy the majority of it's customer base. The BBC is a major player in technological development, please sign this petition to encourage companies to derive new technologies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
